alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 27 at 6:37PM EST until February 28 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Alleghany NC County. In Virginia, Carroll County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts can blow down trees and power lines causing power outages Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles and particularly on north- south oriented roadways, such as Interstate 77 between the North Carolina state line and Hillsville, VA. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevations above 3500 ft will experience the highest wind gusts, which are expected to occur in the time frame of 8 PM EST this evening to 6 AM EST Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
